channel.title: How is runescape now to you?
channel.description: to me there is just too much shit now, i only really liked runescape for the pking but i feel it has changed to much and now is pretty much shit. You used to be able to start a new account and just mine ess to get enough cash to create a decent low leveled pure then go pking all within 4 hours? The summoning skill i think was not built for low levels in mind as charms are not tradeable and the most common way to get them is via killing monsters. The new weapons are totally overpowered to name a few: godsword, darkbow and dclaws. Trade limits have also made the game worse i think because you cannot really help any of your friends or own acounts out, or sell GP unlessyour doing a shit method where you end up loosing quite a bit of your cash. They should make the crafting and smithing skills play a bigger part in the game and make the best armour and weapons made by players.

item.title: How is runescape now to you?

item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

la­wl:

new quests are shit, new skills are shit, pretty much everything they’ve changed in the last 2 years has been negative

Agreed, Runescape now is just lame.

item.title: How is runescape now to you?
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

BloodRayne:

I’ve got all 99 melee stats, and I think it’s still perfectly fine. Got a 12m pvp drop last night(vesta longsword), and I’m fine with that as well. ^^

Do you lthink its fine because you have 99 Melle Skills? or is there another reason?
i can’t enjoy runescape anymore really it seems there is too much to do, I seem over wealmed with finding something to do.

Read full topic

item.title: How is runescape now to you?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

Davidude:

tl;dr to both posts, but I’ll just iterate what I said in the other thread; it’s not a multiplayer game any more. Jagex has made it into a game in which they control the economy and other things like communist bastards. They have policed the game so much that it’s impossible to have any freedom. Shit game now. End of story.

This ^^

Read full topic

Despite this i can still play it, but it’s not nearly as good as it once was.[/quote]
yea, i quit when wildy was removed lol, dropped a red mask and then rememberd dropping items with that value was disabled lol

item.title: How is runescape now to you?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Davidude:

tl;dr to both posts, but I’ll just iterate what I said in the other thread; it’s not a multiplayer game any more. Jagex has made it into a game in which they control the economy and other things like communist bastards. They have policed the game so much that it’s impossible to have any freedom. Shit game now. End of story.

Rep–
Anyways, I used to enjoy it many years ago, but that was really only because I played with my friends. I’ve moved on now, and so have they [most of them at least]. However, most of the changes wouldn’t have affected me - I didn’t pvp apart from duel arena and castle wars, I didn’t merchant so GE would actually have been a benefit for me, and I didn’t play enough to amass the gold for high level weapons, however I did appreciate their affect on lowering the whips prices. I still probably will never play again, though.

Read full topic

item.title: How is runescape now to you?
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

Lothy:

If you want easy charms at a low level, kill flesh crawlers. They’re level 25 and can be found on the second level of the security stronghold - I can guarantee you that you’ll receive an ample amount of green charms, fire runes, noted iron ore, and ranarr weed - sppt was playing there just last night and can tell you this from experience… Or you can take my word for it, because I afk’d my ranger there for quite a long time.

Yeah, I had like 4k fire runes in an hour, and enough ranarr weed to net me like 120k, it’s nice! Also quite a bit of noted iron yes, and some green charms as well.

Read full topic

cane:

to me there is just too much shit now, i only really liked runescape for the pking but i feel it has changed to much and now is pretty much shit. You used to be able to start a new account and just mine ess to get enough cash to create a decent low leveled pure then go pking all within 4 hours? The summoning skill i think was not built for low levels in mind as charms are not tradeable and the most common way to get them is via killing monsters. The new weapons are totally overpowered to name a few: godsword, darkbow and dclaws. Trade limits have also made the game worse i think because you cannot really help any of your friends or own acounts out, or sell GP unlessyour doing a shit method where you end up loosing quite a bit of your cash. They should make the crafting and smithing skills play a bigger part in the game and make the best armour and weapons made by players.

i really never cared about Runescape since the pking system changed (Lovely Old Wildy got screwed), now i just care about hacking the client and stuff
